name: Heaven's Essence
description:
RIP Harambe Studios is proud to present the Twin-stick science-fantasy Space Shoot Heaven's Essence.

Control Raldir the Knight Demigod Defender of the Universe as he battles the corrupted forces of evil absorbing their souls to gain more power!

Unlock and master five different attacks as you make your way through waves of fiendish monsters, spawned by the corrupt souls of the universe!

Compatible with both the Xbox One and Playstation 4 Gamepads.

Good luck, and may you never fall.
